info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 06 at 8:49PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. Myakka River At Myakka River State Park affecting Sarasota County. Peace River At Zolfo Springs at SR 17 affecting Hardee County. Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. Peace River At Bartow affecting Polk County. .Minor to major river flooding continues in the wake of the heavy rainfall associated with former Hurricane Ian. Dry conditions are expected for the next few days which will allow flood waters to gradually recede. For the Myakka...including Myakka River State Park...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Peace...including Bartow, Zolfo Springs at SR 17, Arcadia at SR 70...Major flooding is forecast. For the Horse Creek...including Arcadia at SR 72...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and forecast to continue. * WHERE...Peace River At Zolfo Springs at SR 17. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM EDT Thursday was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 18.1 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.7 feet on 10/22/1952. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Peace River Zolfo Springs at 16.0 19.7 Thu 7 pm 19.1 18.6 18.1 17.6 17.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning by 1100 AM EDT.
